ErrorPage.title: Houston, we have a problem
ErrorPage.message: But don’t worry, we’re working to fix it as soon as possible. Please try again in a few moments. Thanks for your patience!

NotFoundPage.title: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for
NotFoundPage.message: Go back or head to the homepage to keep exploring.

BitcoinBalanceHelpModal.totalDescription: The total amount of {symbol} you hold in your Roxpaper spot account.
BitcoinBalanceHelpModal.availableDescription: The total amount of {symbol} that are available for trading without any restrictions.
BitcoinBalanceHelpModal.frozenDescription: The total amount of {symbol} that are locked in open orders and cannot be traded until the orders are executed or canceled.

TotalBalanceHelpModal.totalDescription: This is the total balance of your Roxpaper spot account, representing the sum of all assets, and valued in {symbol}
TotalBalanceHelpModal.availableDescription: The total amount of assets that are available for trading without any restrictions.
TotalBalanceHelpModal.frozenDescription: The total amount of assets that are locked in open orders and cannot be traded until the orders are executed or canceled.

InvalidLink.title: Oh no!
InvalidLink.message: It looks like your email confirmation link has expired or isn’t working. Don’t worry, just go back to Roxom and we’ll send you a new, updated link.

Auth.invalidOTPMessage: Invalid verification code. Please try again.

NotReceivedPopup.title: Didn't receive the email verification code?
NotReceivedPopup.description: The email verification code has been sent to your email. If you haven't received the code after several attempts, please try the following:

suggestions.s1: 1. Check if it is in your junk/spam mail.
suggestions.s2: 2. Make sure your email address is
suggestions.s3: 3. The message may be delayed for a few minutes. Try again after 20 minutes.

OTPVerification.title: Verify your email
OTPVerification.codeSent: A 6-digit code has been sent to
OTPVerification.timeDisclaimer: Please enter it within the next 10 minutes.

SignInForm.title:
Hello Bitcoiner,
 Welcome to the Beta
SignInForm.agreeTo: By creating an account, I agree to Roxom's
SignInForm.betaText1: Haven’t signed up for the Beta yet?
SignInForm.betaText2: to register and secure your spot.

TermsOfServiceModal.title: You’re almost in, Bitcoiner!
TermsOfServiceModal.description: In this beta version, you’ll be using paper BTC and paper stocks to try out the platform.
TermsOfServiceModal.checkBoxLabel: To continue with the Roxpaper experience, please accept the <tycPage>terms and conditions</tycPage> and our <privacyPage>privacy policy</privacyPage>.

OrdersTable.noActiveOrders: You don't have any active orders. Start trading!
OrdersTable.noHistoricOrders: Your order history is empty. Place an order to see it here.

OrderHistoryDetail.noOrderDetailsError: An error occurred while searching the order details

OrderTicket.sharesNotEnough: Your availables shares are not enough
OrderTicket.orderError: Failed to place the order: {error} Please try again.

ConfirmationModal.checkBox: Don't show this message again for future trades

Nav.assetsDescription: Monitor your balances and make quick decisions for your spot trades
Nav.accountDescription: Monitor your balances and make quick decisions for your spot trades

LoggedUser.bannerText: Want to learn more about the Beta? Click here for more information and start your journey with Roxpaper.

NonLoggedUser.bannerText: Haven't joined the Beta yet? Sign up and be one of the first to try RoxPaper. Join the Beta

WelcomeBeta.title: Welcome to the
WelcomeBeta.tips1: 1. Trade real markets with demo BTC.
WelcomeBeta.tips3: 3. Share youre feedback with us to improve the Roxpaper experience.
WelcomeBeta.message: Now that you have access, you can start exploring the Bitcoin-native financial market. Use your demo BTC to test out spot and derivative trading in a risk-free environment.
WelcomeBeta.feedback: Your feedback is essential as we continue refining the product. We'd love to hear your thoughts!

ReadyToTrade.title: You're ready to Trade
ReadyToTrade.message: Your 0.5 BTC demo assets are available. Start trading now and explore all the features Roxpaper offers.
